name: TheProverbsFlasher
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
One Proverb a day keeps the blues away. This Flash Briefing lets you listen to one new proverb every day, spoken to you by a voice actor.

This skill is hosted by Witlingo. If you would like your very own flash briefing, please check out: https://www.witlingo.com/flashbriefing/
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
